page.title: 02Bonchurch Down Radar Station
page.content: { The Radar Station was built in 1938 and has 12 men working there. There are{150}pieces of electrical apparatus. Nothing in the Radar Station is top secret,it is all confidential. There are{11,000 volts} in the whole Radar Station.The radar Station covers{27 acres}of land. The person in charge of the Radar Station is called the{Senior Engineer. There are{4}Radars in the Radar Station.The oldest Radar in the Radar Station is{22}years old.It costs{1 {million pounds}to build a Radar Station. The Radars go round 11 times a minute. It took a year to build the Radar Station.The heaviest Radar weighs{11}tons.The Radar Station will be closing in a few years. A Radar can send up to 300 waves in 1 minute it can see 150 miles in every direction.
